pageContext.claim: “We're opening up mines in Minnesota, the great state of Minnesota. They have magnificent mines that have the best iron ore in the world and President Obama closed them down.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a suspect claim. It really only involves one mining project. The Trump administration from its earliest days began to clear obstacles that the Obama administration had imposed on one proposed copper mine that a Chilean billionaire wanted in the area around Minnesota's Boundary Waters. The Chilean billionaire, Andrónico Luksic, owns the Washington home where Trump's daughter Ivanka and her husband Jared Kushner are tenants.
